title: Weather Dashboard
subtitle: A simple dashboard that lets users check real-time weather data for any city. It uses the OpenWeather API and includes features like temperature graphs and location search history.

title: Campus Connect
subtitle: A community platform for students to find study groups, buy and sell used books, and share campus events. Built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

title: Portfolio Builder
subtitle: A customizable personal website template for students to showcase their projects, resume, and contact info. Designed to help beginners learn the basics of web layouts and styling.

title: Smart Budget Tracker
subtitle: A personal finance tracker that helps users categorize expenses, visualize spending trends, and set savings goals. Built with React and Chart.js.

title: Study Timer App
subtitle: A Pomodoro-style study timer built using Python and Tkinter. It tracks focus sessions, break times, and daily productivity stats in a simple interface.

title: Eventify
subtitle: A mobile app for discovering and organizing local events. It includes RSVP management, event maps, and real-time chat for attendees.

title: AI Notes Assistant
subtitle: An AI-powered note summarizer that extracts key points from long lectures or text documents. Uses natural language processing to generate concise summaries.

title: Quiz Master
subtitle: A fun quiz app that pulls random trivia questions from an API. Tracks user scores and includes a leaderboard feature for friendly competition.

title: Virtual Garden
subtitle: An interactive 3D garden simulation built with Three.js. Users can plant virtual flowers, adjust lighting, and explore the environment in real-time.
